text:
Engineer Notebook

Take a look at your sketches and think about you work in class today. Then answer the two questions below.

  • What parts of today's lesson helped you generate ideas? What worked for you? What didn't work?
  • What do you think you did well in today's lesson? What do you want to improve?

Additionally, you should note anything important you learned about idea generation, any questions you have, any design ideas or sketches or whatever else you want to write about! You can write or sketch in the boxes below (or do both). You do not need to write in complete sentences.

Documentation

Document your design process. Take all your sketches and the engineer notebook and add them to the Learning Journal.
